thread.title: Legoland 1st Fla. theme park to have official currency listed on exchange board
thread.title_full: Legoland 1st Fla. theme park to have official currency listed on exchange board

author: Cindy Barth
title: Legoland 1st Fla. theme park to have official currency listed on exchange board
text:
Chip Litherland Legoland Florida Resort has entered into an exclusive partnership with Travelex to listâ€¦ more Legoland Florida has entered into an exclusive partnership with Travelex to list the resort's official Legoland Dollars on Travelex's currency exchange boards at 55 participating Travelex locations. With the partnership, Legoland Florida becomes the first theme park to have an official currency listed on a currency exchange board. The Legoland Dollar will be available for purchase at a 1:1 exchange rate to the U.S. dollar, with a minimum exchange of $5. Legoland Dollars will only be available for purchase with U.S. dollars and can be purchased through select Travelex locations for the summer 2015 season. With a $50 purchase, guests will receive $50 in Legoland Dollars, plus an additional $39.25 in added value, including free parking, an upgrade to the Legoland Water Park and an order of the resort's famous Granny's Apple Fries. The dollars can be spent at any of the park's restaurants, concessions, retail stores and more. Legoland Dollars will be available at Travelex locations in Atlanta, Boca Raton, Dallas, D.C., Fort Myers, Fort Lauderdale, Houston, Orlando, Palm Beach, Philadelphia and Tampa. "Everything at Legoland Florida is created for kids, including the currency. By using Legoland Dollars with a playful design, it builds on the immersive experience for young guests," said Adrian Jones , general manager of the theme park. Legoland Florida Resort is a 150-acre interactive theme park in Winter Haven with more than 50 rides, shows and attractions.
